description: Details submitted to 24/03689/FUL for Demolition Methodology (4) Construction Management Plan (8) in respect of the erection of a two-storey new build structure within the courtyard.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted in regard to Construction Methodology including the storage of materials, sustainable travel to site, hoarding, siting and design of ancillary structures. The details are therefore unacceptable and detrimental to highway safety, contrary to policies DMD47 and DMD48 of the Development Management Document, CP24 and CP25 of the Core Strategy, T4, T5 and T7 of the London Plan and the advice contained within the NPPF.

Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrated that the proposed measures for dust control are sufficient to minimise dust emissions of PM10 and PM2.5, therefore air quality would be harmed and therefore contrary to Policies SI1 of the London Plan 2021, CP 32 of Core Strategy 2010 and DMD 65 of the Development Management Document 2014 and the NPPF 2024.
